content: space chain 1 3 double_crochet chain 1 3 double_crochet in remaining 3 chain 1 sps chain 1 join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 finish off weave in loose ends just ducky cuddle quilt materials needed size g crochet hook tapestry needle 20 oz turqua worsted weight yarn 16 oz white worsted weight yarn 16 oz medium sage worsted weight yarn 26 oz yellow worsted weight yarn 6 oz country blue worsted weight yarn 2 oz black worsted weight yarn 1 oz carrot worsted weight yarn afghan assembly using tapestry needle and appropriate color yarn and stitching through blo assemble using the diagram below for placement border round 1 with yellow join with a slip_stitch to any corner chain 1 space single_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner chain 1 space join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join round 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet in each single_crochet around work 3 double_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 to join round 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each double_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join finish off weave in loose ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
